key.name: pool-capacity
key.description: Capacity of pellet pool which pre-creates and stores pellets. No extra creation of pellet. ( If all of pellets in pool are on screen, no spawning pellet before some pellet get out and be availiable to use. )

key.name: spawn-timeout
key.description: Spawning timeout. (or interval) On every timeout, a pellet is spawned in spawn-probability

key.name: spawn-probability
key.description: Spawning probability where spawning is actually done. 0 never spawn any pellets, 1 spawns a pellet every timeout.

key.name: proceed-timeout
key.description: Timeout ( or interval ) of animating pellets. lower value would yields smoother animation but uses more cpu time.
